property.name: applicationPath
property.help: - Path where sample application is kept

property.name: apacheTomcatRoot
property.help: - Path where sample application is kept

property.name: sessionCookieDomain
property.help: - Domain name of the company for ex. If deploying at Verizon than domain name can be ".verizon.com"

property.name: distributedDialect
property.help: - Dialect to use while connecting to db in distributed.cfg.xml

property.name: distributedConnectionDriverClass
property.help: - Driver used for connecting to distributed db

property.name: distributedConnectionUrl
property.help: - Url of the distributed db server running

property.name: sslModeForDBConnection
property.help: - use ssl for distributed db server running

property.name: distributedConnectionUserName
property.help: - Login Id of the distributed db server running

property.name: distributedConnectionPassword
property.help: - Login password of the distributed db server running

property.name: solutionName
property.help: - Solution name for this solution, must be same across all nodes running this solution

property.name: rubixClusterId
property.help: - Rubix cluster id for this rubix cluster, must be same across all nodes of a rubix cluster

property.name: L2CacheClusterName
property.help: - Unique cluster name, used by L2 cache jgroup

property.name: infinispanJgroupConfigFile
property.help: - JGroup config file for hibernate L2 cache cluster

property.name: umBindPort
property.help: - Listening port for UM Jgroups cluster

property.name: umDiscoveryTimeout
property.help: - Discovery request timeout for um cluster

property.name: umInitialHost
property.help: - Ip address of all machines in UM Jgroups cluster

property.name: umPortRange
property.help: - Port Range for all machines in um jgroups cluster

property.name: umNumInitialMembers
property.help: - Initial member count for um groups cluster

property.name: acumeCoreCacheUseInsta
property.help: - If Insta is to be used for Hive Queries

property.name: acumebinsource
property.help: - If Insta is to be used for Hive Queries

property.name: timeserieslevelpolicymap
property.help: - If Insta is to be used for Hive Queries

property.name: mailSender
property.help: - User-name on which be-half mail would be sent

property.name: mailErrCheckInterval
property.help: - Time interval error queue is checked and re-sent

property.name: tomcatClusterName
property.help: - The tomcat cluster to which this node belongs

property.name: tomcatClusterInfo
property.help: - All the members which are part of the tomcat cluster except itself

property.name: redirectPort
property.help: - Port used by UI for https connection to tomcat

property.name: connectorPort
property.help: - Port used by UI for http connection to tomcat

property.name: ssoIssuerId
property.help: - Unique Issuer identifier for Single Sign On using SAML

property.name: pojoNamesToUseHibernateSequence
property.help: - Pojo names which need to enforce usage of hibernate sequence table
